text: The Cry Of The Icemark is the first book in the Icemark Chronicles that are written by the English author Stuart Hill. The book won the Ottakar's Children's Book Prize in 2005. It also won the 2006 Highlands Children's Book award for Long Novels in 2006.Winner of the Highland Children's Book Award 2006 It is followed by The Blade of Fire. == References == Category:2005 books Category:The Icemark Chronicles
title: The Cry of the Icemark
